Name: ntsven
Title: Good shopping mall
Review: Good place to shop. You have most of the Indian brands and few foreign brands. Food court is spacious and has good choice of restaurenta.Overall, it's a nice place to shop.

Name: Hertz Martin
Title: Nice and Near
Review: While there are quite a lot of brands (outlet and dining), it's funny that you have to buy a card when paying in cash. Beautiful Christmas display and attraction to the kids right at the center of the mall. Shops are comparatively smaller.

Name: Rahul T
Title: Good place to spend an evening away from city traffic and the heat.
Review: Good place to shop, dine and spend some time away from the hot climate and the traffic. For people going for first time it will be a treat for the eyes as well.

Name: OMO
Title: Just another mall
Review: Fairly modern and large shopping center offering branded shops as well as local shops.Has a cinema and a large food court on the top floor.There are also 2 basement floors which are accessible via the main entrance.

Name: Rajnikant
Title: Pathetic food#wow momo
Review: Mall is very nice but # wow momo food is very pathetic we ask for Darjeeling momo combo and order for pan fried momo and chicken thupka but the chicken was very stale and smelly  didn't have any flavour and veg momo was uncooked very disappoint with #wow momo express Avenue mall I'm a very regular of wow momo in versions places .

Name: Harish
Title: Best Mall of Chennai
Review: Almost all international brands are present in the Mall .The mall is very spacious and it is a pleasure to shop in this mall

Name: Abdul wahaab
Title: Best mall in Hotspot location
Review: Always a special place in the hot spot of the city and easily approachable from all ends of city. All the branded showrooms are available in this mall. Fun city and food court also available. Good place for couples, family, friends, kids too

Name: arnold ahmed
Title: Good enough
Review: Express and Phoenix mall are the best malls in chennai for me as they have shops of our needs but its always crowded.

Name: Siva Kumar
Title: Perfect place for shopping with family
Review: It is a perfect place for shopping & getting some entertainment for family. Everything is available in one place

Name: Ananth 727499
Title: Excellent place ..
Review: This mall has a wide area for parking the cars and there is a digital Board at the entrance of the car parking.. it shows how may places are vacant for parking..Almost all types of shops are available here.. toys, clothing, watches, play items,Pizza shops, virtual Game shop etc.. Good place to spend your time and purchase things ( make sure your wallet is full)..

Name: Hooray H
Title: New Mall
Review: I really dislike Malls & will only go to them when it's a quiet time & if the sales are on.Never in the evening. Who wants to be surrounded by thousands of people jostling you whilst you are trying to shop.The access is not so convenient & can be quite confusing.Lots of shops for you to waste your money on!Of course it's freezing cold so take a hat, coat & scarf.

Name: Jivi_Jebaraj
Title: All in one mall in the heart of city
Review: This place can be accessible by public transport also, for me parking is not a problem and the mall is planned with the same product in one area.

Name: Ambrish L
Title: Just Another mall with all the shops
Review: Its a mall, after all, You'll find most of the brands here, Its accessible from the LIC metro station, You should be able to take a 10 mins walk. Nice place to go shopping. There is a big bazaar(supermarket) at the basement which has almost everything.

Name: krish
Title: Top class
Review: We enjoyed our shopping in Expresses avenue mall  is good nice entertaining with our collection of dresses.

Name: Frank Calberg
Title: Clean everywhere
Review: It was clean everywhere at the mall which I appreciated. There is a good variety of shops. I found that products in the supermarkets on the bottom floor are well organized and presented. On the top floor, where there is a good view over the city, I had a strawberry fruit juice which tasted well. Thank you.

Name: Rohini
Title: Mall
Review: You will find most of the brand here .good customer service .escape as cinema .food court . Foreign exchange. At ground floor .was more helpful.

Name: Vijay
Title: Good weekend
Review: The mall had everything what is required for good weekend .. be it for shopping accessories, groceries, personal care etc. Great food court with options for various cuisine and to end with movie.

Name: Dcruz10
Title: A Relatively Smaller Mall
Review: This is called "E&A Mall" by its abbrevation. You find plenty of brands having their outlets here. It is situated very close to the Taj Clubhouse in Chennai. Chennai airport is just 10km from this place. There is a foodcourt on the top floor having several outlets. There is a centralized payment system to buy food here. You buy a recharge card & top-up whatever amount you want & then pay the many restaurants through this card. There are also some individual restaurants having separate enclosures on the same floor having their own payment system. We found the parking arrangement on the ground a bit confusing for someone coming here for the first time.

Name: Everlook
Title: Nice experience
Review: The entertainment portion of the mall very big. All brands shops and food court was very good. We had purchase the clothes and had dinner n food court vth friends and we feel at abroad. Enjoy the movie n theater.

Name: Suma S
Title: Pleasant shopping
Review: A nice place.  Max, lifestyle, hamleys , westside home centre etc have outlets. Nice place to spend time with friends to do window shopping.

Name: Mrudula
Title: Mall
Review: This is a vast mall in Chennai in wide range of varieties. The mall is the main attraction of the place with reasonable prices

Name: prem sagar
Title: Perfect Mall
Review: Perfect place to spend weekends with family: games, movies, shopping, etc.. Environment was so good.

Name: arnold ahmed
Title: Spacious but crowded
Review: Decent shopping mall with good collections of shops. Very crowded on weekends. The food court only accept their own card payment system which i find is nuisance.

Name: devan2599
Title: Shoppers Paradise for women
Review: Men and women dress is in abundance with its multitude of colors and style. We make an years purchase at west side, go colors etc

Name: Averyl78
Title: Best place to shop for good brands
Review: Situated in Royapettah is this big mall that has great brands under one roof.  They have many cuisines in the food court.   Home to PVR cinemas you can really spend a day with your family navigating through the shops, enjoying some good food and catching your favourite movie. Parking is expensive though.

Name: Linda A
Title: Nice.shopping complex.shops attractive.staff very helpful.gd choice of products
Review: Like 3 shop I big bazaar.favourite shops pantaloons Westside lifestyle.sephora.forest essentials.products in.f essentials r xcellent. Nice staff

Name: XPLORING
Title: Good shopping mall
Review: Quite sizable mall . Spacious and clean. Bathrooms are a bit unkept . A good variety of stores. Movies and food court with many options .

Name: Mohammed khan
Title: Very good place for shopping üõç
Review: Excellent food in mall , many international brands available, and big bazaar , money exchange are available in mall, if some my friends looking some money changing

Name: Rizly Salim
Title: Nice place
Review: Convenient and good location with all brands. Good bargains at Van Huisen. Food court is fine with all varieties of dishes.

Name: Anushka Jayasinghe
Title: Big mall in Chennai
Review: Big shopping mall in Chennai. Almost all branded items are available in this mall and you get good discount deals on weekends perticularly Sundays.

Name: PANDEY JI
Title: One of the best malls in Chennai!
Review: The mall showcases all the popular brands.I mean there's almost every brand present in the mall.The Movie Theater is too good, every audi has a different theme and decor.The food court is great as well.

Name: #amosamiyanayeküéß
Title: üõçÔ∏è
Review: quit lard and the simply best... lots of stores are there including pharmacy, just went for Windows Shopping best attractive was escape cinema from sathyam the loo was so neat and clean at the same gaming zone for kids it's just a small but qute

Name: Saji M. Abraham
Title: Expect more.
Review: This mall will surprise you with its world class facilities. Almost all international brands had an outlet in here. It has a vast lobby and clean washrooms. You won't feel like you are at Chennai, once you are in. They do have an effective food court too. Try it, you won't be disappointed.

Name: satheesh
Title: The New Spencer plaza of modern Chennai
Review: It has become the goto place and you will find that it will be always crowded, be it day or night.It attracts people of all ages and there in lies its strength

Name: Bala P
Title: Very good
Review: Shopping mall modern and new.  The stores include those from North America and London England.   High end mall that has a good food court

Name: Adele Augustin
Title: Best shopping mall in Chennai
Review: Nice shopping mall to have different lunch (different than indian food in local restaurants), espresso coffee (but not in starbucks) and escape the hot weather. Very clean toilets and washrooms.

Name: Aldrin J
Title: Nice mall
Review: Nice mall with many shops.Have an excellent theatre. Good for family and friends. Normally everything will be a little costly.

Name: lushenthree k
Title: What a joy
Review: We loved this mall. we stayed  close by so we went there frequently.we really enjoyed the kids entertainment.Big bazaar was my favorite shop.and the food choices were great.

Name: LostMySelfTraveling
Title: We enjoyed watching in this mall
Review: We enjoyed every visit to this mall. You find all the branded stores under one roof. The mall close to city and Mount Road. Once you enter this mall you feel you are in a different world. There are food courts and all luxurious brands available in the mall. It's is one of the best malls in Chennai for shopping and entertainment like watching movies.

Name: SkrillMu
Title: Huge place, plenty of dining options
Review: This place was packed even on a regular weekday. Great variety of restaurants and fast-food chains. Good mix of international and home-grown brands within the complex.

Name: kungfupanda
Title: Shop all you can.
Review: I have been here several times and I enjoyed shopping in this mall.All Because they have my favorite brand "Forever 22" Always happy to visit while I'm in the city.

Name: Pamela Jane Katie
Title: Useful
Review: This shopping centre is useful but once inside, it feels like any shopping centre in Europe or mall in N. America. ATMs are on the top floor. Shop security guards in every doorway and they will check your purchases against your receipt. This is normal and should not be taken as suspicion. Also, in some shops they will take any larger bags from you for keeping until you leave. This is not a criticism, just the way that they do it. Very well air conditioned so a relief form the streets outside.  Easy to get a TukTuk on your way out, to your next destination. Opens at 10am for the shops and later for the cinema. They also have offices in the same building so you need to pa attention to which entrance door you need. Bottles of water can be bought at some of the cafe/food outlets.

Name: Abdul wahaab
Title: Very oldest mall in Chennai
Review: It is one of the oldest mall situated in teh heart of the city. Very near to marina and accessible with public mode of transport Though the parking fee is high ,we can find enormous amount of people here always

Name: mohamed ahraaf
Title: My stay
Review: A very pleasant stay.Nice hospitality .I was impressed by the service of Amit.The food is really good.It has really improved than the previous visit.

Name: Valavanur Natar... K
Title: A WRITE UP ON Emami Star Mark book stire on sevond floor EA mall Roayapettah,,Chennai
Review: A review of Star Mark Book Store in EA mall Second floor ,RoyapettahChennai¬†I had some time back reviewed oneOf Chennai's pride of book stores that stood the test of time from the British days in India namelyHiggin Bothams on Anna Salai.But there was another store called Land Mark ,that literally made its mark as one of the finest book store¬† ¬†in a very short span¬†of time .It was started by an enerprising couple Ms Hemu Ramiah and her husband Rangi ,who was also a fine hotelier .She expanded from one basement store in Nungumbakkam high Road to Spencer mall and then City centre mall and went on to open huge stores in Calcutta and Bangalore .Her hands on approach and deep knowledge in books , helped her organisation to grow leaps and bounds, in a very short span of time.Realising that on line book sales andKindle versions would affect foot falls in stores over a period¬†of time,¬†she smartly exited the business at the right time , selling her venture to Tatas who eventually closed it down due to poor generation of profits .Star mark id¬† now an ongoing book store in Chennai .It was Promoted in 1999 in collaboration with this Landmark I¬† mentioned¬† above , and is wholly owned by the Emami Group, Eastern India‚Äôs leading business house.In April 2007, Starmark merged with Frank Ross Ltd, a sister company of Emami, which is also one of Kolkata‚Äôs leading pharmacy chains.As one of the leading and fastest growing personal and healthcare businesses in India, The Emami Group has an enviable portfolio of OTC products used in¬† households.It was Established in 1974, and presently operates in more than 60 countries including GCC, Europe, Africa, CIS countries and the SAARCIt¬† is able to support the Star Mark¬† book store¬† ¬†to serve the literary community's¬† needs and also offer many consumer items and stationary items and toys.¬†They store books on wide ranging topics like education,science, fiction Cooking, Art and literature, Architecture and many more .They also offer journals and periodicals like Auto magazines.I would suggest thsse visiting¬†E A mall to visit this store¬† for at least browsing around if they have timevto kill ,and who knows they may even¬† pick up something they have alway wanted to buy and just did not have the time to do so.A hindu sponsored Coffee shop just opposite to star Mark store , willoffer one¬† an opportunity to enjoy a good filter coffee and browse a magazine or a book they picked from the store .Star mark also operated¬† a similar store in¬† Velacheri Phoenix mall .

Name: sekaran n
Title: Express Avenue
Review: One of the centrally located mall in Chennai. Had good brand outlets, decent food court and multiplex theatres. Have tried food at couple of places. OK type only. Avoid going on week ends due to heavy rush

Name: Sujay
Title: Not very organised
Review: using Google maps we went there and was trying to enter through gate 3, the security person there stopped is and told "sir.. premium parking.."i told ok.. as i entered inside i was told again by some other staff that parking fee for 3 hours is 170rs..i told ok.. and parked the car and noticed that there are very few cars parked..went inside tried to locate rest rooms but couldn't locate without asking a person there.. sold have been more sign boards... in boys rest room there is no separate urinal for kids and rest rooms are all wet..quite good number of brand outlets are there.. and few are throwing offers too.. kids play area, eateries and movies are in top floor.. went to have coffee.. but i was given a card first in which i have to to up money which can be used in the eateries..it might be easier for some but i found it cumbersome.. that card can be topped up at the kiosks where swiping machines are available or at the cash counters.. some shops like kfc accept direct payment..to go from one floor to another multiple lifts are there but people are waiting in queue for the lesser and more centrally located lifts..i advise to use more peripherally located lifts which are free...tried to purchase in health and glow.. they didn't accept google pay... had to use card...overall pretty average experience... there is a lot of scope for improvement..

Name: sukunaravee
Title: Holiday
Review: Good place to shop. Branded goods available and it is part of E Hotel. There were many dining places in the mall

Name: VATSALA04
Title: Mama Mia !! It works !
Review: So..we walked into this newly opened restaurant in the mall ( the paint was still wet.. no cobwebs...no sticky stuff under the table ..) expecting to grab a bite ( the bite away from home for my husband & I usually means a hearty Indian Chinese meal in Mainland China ) with no lofty expectations !! surprise surprise..we landed up spending over an hour ...not because we had the time..turned out a good feel place to be , noisy but in a nice way! loud colorful decor but in a lively way ! Food...  Not Indian Chinese ! But nevermind ! good tasty Pan Asian medley of Chinese, Thai. Japanese & surely Indian !! Tasty Tasty! Warning ! When you order one portion of whatever, make sure 3 to 4 of you share it !

Name: Nagarjuna
Title: Awesome experience
Review: Beautiful experienceOnly thing I request is follow Hyderabad modelWhen customer shows bill or movie ticketPlease provide them free parkingIncluding forTwo wheelersRegards

Name: Dr P Nagaraj
Title: Favourite Mall Destination
Review: This is one of my Favourite Mall Destination in the city with ample space beautiful scenic well maintained with major shopping and great cinema screens Food court located

Name: akeeneye
Title: Unclean wash rooms....
Review: How can we have a dirty unkept wash room in the food court area.The experience was what to say UN appetising.......

Name: dilshadkn123
Title: Charming mall
Review: Superbly built mall around 1000+ parking. Its a place one can spend 3/4 hours easily. Good branded outlets there to hang on. Coffee shops and food courts also in the list to enjoy.

Name: Jarevu
Title: Shop till you drop!
Review: Awesome place to shop. An all in one stop! Food, cinemas, groceries, fashion n more! Be sure to catch a movie there. I regularly shop at Fab India and Soch. The prices are reasonable and on par with the big stores like Saravanas with 10 times the service. Food Bazaar and fashion is another gem. Be surprised by the price. Also check out the home furnishing store and Westside. You can spend a whole day there easily! Check out the food court too

Name: vasuprofiles
Title: Express Avenue, a good shopping collection
Review: It was for a window shopping we actually went to EA. But it turned up spending a good chunk. üòäThere were quite a good variety of collections either in clothing, shoes, watches, sunglasses, mobiles, grooming, or entertainment.Children had some food of their choice and ladies had a good shopping experience. It is a decent place.The only challenge is that it is in the heart of the city and a lot of traffic is outside it.

Name: 2015Minnie
Title: Must visit mall in Chennai
Review: Ample stores and good collection. Has parking. Almost all brands are present in the mall. Must visit this place if staying in Chennai.

Name: Vaibhav
Title: Best Place for Window Shopping
Review: The mall has all the major Indian and international brands under one roof and a fantastic food court. The movie theatre is great too. The place has ample parking and a wonderful classy feel. It is one of the largest malls of Chennai.

Name: Suraj K
Title: Good mall
Review: Just like all the other new malls but in a cleaner state..lots of places to do shopping as well as kids entertainment area..

Name: Suruchi J
Title: Like any other
Review: All kind of shops and restaurants,  like  any other mall.nothing special .not many international brand

Name: Gairik M
Title: Grand mall in Chennai
Review: It's a big shopping mall harboring shops from a wide range of national and international brands. The food court present at the topmost floor serves fine delicacies.

Name: sherazz
Title: Wonderful, entertaining mall- a one stop centre!
Review: A one stop centre to shop, dine, watch movies, play games etc. Clean, not too crowded and well sized (not too big like Phoenix Mall), one is assured of a good time here. The Escape cinemas are modern and very clean with great infra. There are also a wide variety of places to dine, both in and around the mall, from fast food (KFC, Pizza Hut, Burger King etc), the food court with a variety of food and plush well known restaurants around the mall, like Zaitoon and Palm Jumeira. Would definitely recommend, as one would not feel time passing in this mall. Easy to get autos and ola taxis from here as well.

Name: anonymous
Title: Movie time
Review: Watched a lot of movies here It is usual like any other mall Nothing greatHad fun though Nothing is cheap der Even coffee is super expensive They have a very good parking area

Name: Ganesh K
Title: Last it's charm
Review: In the beginning it's charm and happening mall. But now maintenance is poor and staff's are total waste. Toilets are not clean. Lot of dust and looking shabby

Name: satheesh
Title: Became The Hangout
Review: EA has turned itself into the goto place of youngsters and is also successful in attracting crowds of all demographic and age groups. The various shops cater to all your needs but it is heavier to your pockets. Well connected with public transportation too.

Name: suria89
Title: Impressive
Review: I am impressed with the maintenance of this mall. It has all the international brands. The food court has amazing choices. Everything is clean and neat. They even have a game arcade there.

Name: Samy S
Title: Very busy
Review: Commercial place ,much busy. Inside many shop are there. But quwit expensive. Ok place for a visit. This place for young crowds

Name: Prabha
Title: Shopping
Review: The Express Avenue Mall is the best shopping center in the vicinity of La Wood Hotel. The displays put up by the various shops in the shopping center were eye -catching , presentable and attractive . The center has all kinds of clothing to cater to different age groups. The food court in the center serves a variety of tasty food .

Name: Dhakra
Title: Jonah‚Äôs masala fries
Review: We went to Jonah‚Äôs after a shopping trip to express Avenue mall. We totally loved the food. Kids ordered masala fries and totally loved it. For the price the quantity was good, fries were nice crunchy and delicious and I ordered veg sushi which was surprisingly delicious. The service was great and the manager came personally to ask if we enjoyed our food. Highly recommend!!!

Name: Docs
Title: Great mall
Review: The usual, kind of mall with the usual shops. Very conveniently and centrally located. Most shops are here and they do have a decent food court. Highly recommended.

Name: KMSMANIAN1049
Title: One of finest Mall in Chennai
Review: Express Avenue Mall (EA in short), one of the newest mall in the city, attracting mostly young crowd, but caters to various types of consumers.

Name: Senthilathiban
Title: Shopping Mall of Convenience
Review: Express Avenue Mall is centrally located in a parallel road to Anna Salai (Mount Road) and nearer to Central and Egmore Railway Station. One of the earliest malls in Chennai, it provides a coll place to shop with almost all branded shops located there. Nice eateries are always available to spend time and have good food. The mall has cine screens. Apart from the shoppers of Chennai, it is a good place for people travellers by train crossing Central and Egmore stations who have time to spend and are willing to do shopping at convenience.

Name: Flying Guy
Title: Express Avenue
Review: My recent visit to Express Avenue mall was a very nice one. Many branded shops available there. Very good for shopping. Food court was amazing. Good for shopping.

Name: shreyasjajoo
Title: Beautiful Mall
Review: This is one of the best malls of southern India. It has a plethora of restaurants to offer and also great shopping experiences are up for grabs here. The mall management is lively and has some or the other crowd engagement event going on continuously. The movie inside the mall looks real swanky on the outside. The staff is courteous and eager to help. It is a great place to chill if one is near Egmore.

Name: SELVARATHINAM M
Title: GOOD LOCATION
Review: This is also a big mall of Chennai city with many brands of clothing store to choose. This also had a multiplex of SPI cinemas which is really a good place watching movies in a relaxed mood with family and friends. There is a food court too. Good parking and easy to access

Name: TE K
Title: Relaxation trip
Review: It is located in Chennai. I visited this place with my friends.it contains shops and food courts and entertainment are there

Name: Meezanur R
Title: Love the big brands? Must go there
Review: If you are a brand lover for clothing and accessories, you must visit the express avenue mall. You will get all the renowned brands in a single boundary. At the main entry, you will see the Starbucks, have a coffee and enjoy the shopping.

Name: ROSHAN K
Title: Friendly visit
Review: I visited this mall on republic day and it was very quite and descent place to visit and it is a bit small mall compare to others and you can get everything right over there

Name: K V K
Title: Express Avenue Mall
Review: Express Avenue mall opened in the year 2010. It is a 3 storied building built on the cast land area belonging to Express newspaper right in the heart of the city. The building itself is about 1750000sq feet with about 90000 sq ft area dedicated to retail trade. The rest of the areas are used up for offices and theatres etc. All branded stores have their own outlet here. The snacks and food court variety is mind boggling.  A good place to spend your spare time and catch up with fashion. The top floor houses all the cine complex and also the food court. The only drawback that we can see here is the huge parking charges that is being charged by the hour, both for the 2 wheelers as also the 4 wheelers. The rates are specially high over the weekends. When we try to follow the foreign markets to suit our needs, we should do so fully and not selectively.

Name: Kandaswami Aravind
Title: Easy shopping
Review: Best place for shopping and hang out. With movie hall, food court, game palace. Nice place with easy packing in centre of city

Name: BhushanRangnekar
Title: Ok for a one time visit
Review: Express avenue mall is strictly ok with the usual shopping options available and a small food court. It has nothing out of the ordinary from other better malls. Visit this only if you have nothing else to do.

Name: 310dori
Title: Perfect- with a bit of everything
Review: It is a large mall, it has great options and it's not crowded. Loved the layout, that it doesn't fell congested at all, very clean. The items range from very affordable to very expensive and everything in between.You find local brands and international ones alike, such as H&M, The Body Shop, Fossil, Samsonite, Forever 21, etc .I liked it very much because the prices were fare,I wasn't charged more because I was a tourist and still I had access to a lot of traditional, ethnic items. The food court also offers a wide range of options- so it's the perfect combination.

Name: JumboMumbai
Title: Christmas revelry..
Review: We went at xmas time And found the mall vibrant and revellingIt was decorated well.. in fact very wellThe shops had offers too.. it has a good mix of brands as it isParking is very haphazard and also expensive which is true of all large malls here.. they need to see Mumbai charges and will surely fall off the chair

Name: shivjyot
Title: Exclusive brands
Review: A huge mall in the center of city with best brands for a happy shopping experience. A happening place with  cultural and promotional events almost every week. Luxurious theatre showing latest movies and a food court to cater to all taste. But high parking charges on weekends.

Name: Jivi_Jebaraj
Title: One of the best malls in Chennai
Review: The major advantage is the location very near to central railway station and not too far from airport.Ample parking place available.food court has many options. Most of the outlets are there.

Name: Soonkeum
Title: Too much like home
Review: Was hoping for local shopping experience but mostly brands you see in US.  Only ATM in entire all was on top floor and not posted on any of the mapsThe stores with Indian products seemed limited and we left after 30 minutes. Mall is huge and well maintained, but if you want a local experience this isnt the place.

Name: Khyati
Title: Nice place
Review: This mall is visited by locals as well as tourists.. nice play area for kids to food court to different shopping shops .. plus Cinema in this too..

Name: Dashers2014
Title: Overrated!
Review: Like any other big city mall. Nothing special. The prices are dear. Kept clean and a nice place to walk around.

Name: Shaji Joseph
Title: very good mall
Review: This mall is one of the biggest mall in Chennai. which is having all branded shoppes outlets in it.  This mall is maintained well full proof security system and having enough parking slots.

Name: niki dee
Title: One of the best malls in Chennai
Review: Well located. Offers a lot of stores including various branded standalones. Various restaurants offering local cuisines on offer. Also the food court includes various small eat outs. Escape cinemas in the mall is also a fun place to go for movies.

Name: Narayanj
Title: A very complete shopping mall with good food and entertainment
Review: A very regularly visited shopping mall in Chennai. Has most of the must have stuff with a wide range of food options. The food debit card expires evey 365 days!! A bit dated mall but still has new shops coming up.

Name: monicasharmaB
Title: Interesting!
Review: Thankfully this is one of those large malls, where you have a variety of shopping outlets. All the major brands of clothes, footwear, fashion accessories, food, etc had a good presence here. A well kept mall in terms of variety and clean floors, I was a bit taken aback at the slight bit of shabbiness in the ladies toilets section. I prefer the washbasin slabs to be perfectly dry, especially since there was a lot of staff chatting away but not bothering to keep the place dry.Other than this, the mall is every bit a great one!

Name: Drew H
Title: Western mall in Chennai
Review: My airline lost my baggage and I needed to find a mall that would have shops that sold clothing that I normally wear. This mall is very clean and easy to get to. They have many western stores like H&M, Adidas, Polo, and the like. I was able to get the clothes I needed without any hassle that you can find at other malls in the area.

Name: 892swapnas
Title: if you want to spend time
Review: I prefer to go to Express Avenue with friends for a leisurely time that may include watching a movie, and non-critical shopping

Name: Rathikaprashanna
Title: 1st world shops
Review: Visited this mall on February 11, 2019.  Its excellent if you are looking for brands such as h&m, adidas, etc.  They have a lot of American name brands. The top floor has a few quality Indian stores with some good selections.  Everything is a little pricy here.  There is also a movie theatre . They do need to make the washrooms more hygienic, and food court as well.  It‚Äôs a little grimy.

Name: Noor Ali Abbas
Title: Middling Mall of Chennai
Review: Express Avenue Mall is an extensive mall in the heart of Chennai city.The mall has more shopping outlets for fashion, lifestyle, electronics and other house hold items. It has Big Bazaar supermarket in which we can purchase almost everything for our home under one roof.Also, it has entertainments like cinemas, games and rides for kids. Most of the restaurants available inside the mall are very expensive. A vast parking area is available and the parking entrance is on the northern side of the mall which is difficult to find for most of the motorists.

Name: Harvey
Title: Good place to hangout in Chennai
Review: Express Avenue Mall has a wide variety of shops, good cinema and an array of eating places. It is a good place to spend a few hours or even a day in Chennai.

Name: Elspeth M
Title: Mall
Review: Lots of international shops throughout the mall.  Top floor has large range of places to eat.  Also has various markets during the year -When I was there they had a  vegan market

Name: umang p
Title: Weekend shopping
Review: Big Mall in Chennai...The mall is well maintained and the shopping experience is really great. Ample parking space is available. Parking piece is tow wheel is 50Rs per hour and for car is 30Rs per hour ... The new Palladium mall is separate for luxury products. The seasonal decorations at the mall are really engaging with the public. Some time Evan will happen it will be good and enjoyable..,I personally love this mall for the way they are public-friendly.. cinemas big the theatre good experience .. good sound effects...you will enjoy you movie ...one of the place most visit in ChennaiThere are good restaurants in food court with variety of options to try. Lot of shops are available with good options in variety. There is movie theater is available inside. Overall good option to shopping and spend time.

Title: A well maintained mall
